edits.description: Added frame styles, wood textures, palette-derived colors
Fixed frame rendering order - draw frame last to mask artwork edges
Thin frames only, palette colors always, artwork scaled inside frame with inner padding
Local libraries (lib/), v1.x features support (physics, boundary, wetness, special effects)
Variable aspect ratios (10 options from square to ultra-wide), batch export 20 PNGs with B key
Rarity curves UI, moved v1.x to molecular-watercolor, consistent frame thickness across aspect ratios

Fantasy Variety Edition: 6 new form types (draconic, tentacular, hydra, knotted, alien, emoji), 8 new materials, 7 special traits, improved render quality with ACES tone mapping and shadows, humorous names throughout

Anatomically accurate vulvic form redesign (labia majora/minora, clitoral hood, vestibule), improved googly eyes (smaller, better positioned, reduced probability to 3%), better emoji expressions with highlights and blush
